# selectionMode

**Instance Property**

The selection mode of the menu.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectionMode: NSMenu.SelectionMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The selection mode only affects menu items that belong to the same selection group. A selection group consists of the items with the same target-action.

## Selecting Items

- **selectedItems**: The menu items that are currently selected.
- **NSMenu.SelectionMode**: Describes how the menu manages selection states of the menu items that belong to the same selection group.
